minelp.options.title: Petite Equine Sailor Choices
minelp.options.ponylevel.ponies.tooltip:
All ye mateys be a wee bit horse

All them landlubbers must be turned into nobile steeds
minelp.options.ponylevel.humans.tooltip:
All ye mateys be yello bellies

Pirates are in disguise as yellow landlubbers
minelp.options.ponylevel.both.tooltip: Let da flag fly proud, is a pony's life fer me
minelp.options.skins.hdskins.disabled: Ay, ya need sum booty but ya aing got any. Better get out an plunder that there harbor: www.minecraft.net to put yer booty thar.
minelp.options.flappyelytras: Look at yew, ye flapping like a wee bird
minelp.options.button.on:
More t' merrier

Show off ya haul even ifn' noboy asked
minelp.options.button.auto:
Proud n' contained

No need ta scare the lad...yet
minelp.options.button.off:
Hidin's for pansies

What are ya? Chicken liver?
minelp.options.option.disabled: Aye, the constable'll put ya in the brig if ya use that!
minelp.mobs.title: Booty
